title: [DREAMER] Implement email notifications with Swoosh adapter
overview:
Critical system alerts, policy violations, and operational notifications cannot be sent via email. The email notification channel is non-functional, limiting the platform's ability to alert operators of important events.

**Motivation:** Email notifications are a core operational requirement. Without functional email delivery, operators miss critical alerts, policy violations go unnoticed, and system reliability decreases.

**Success criteria:**
- Emails sent via Swoosh adapter
- Supports multiple email providers (SendGrid, AWS SES, SMTP)
- Template rendering for notification content
- Delivery status tracking
- Bounce and complaint handling

**Technical constraints:**
- Must use Swoosh library
- Needs proper template rendering
- Should support multiple providers
- Delivery tracking required
- Rate limiting to prevent blocking

**In scope:**
- Implement send_email_request/2 with Swoosh
- Add email template rendering
- Configure provider (SendGrid/SES/SMTP)
- Add delivery tracking
- Write integration tests
**Out of scope:**
- Notification channel management (already exists)
- SMS or other channels (separate)
- Email preference management (future)

**Signals:** priority: medium, urgency: Operational alerting blocked
